title: Internet of Things, Thugs, Truth
description: Forever seeking the solace of a higher power through the sometimes harsh realities of her career, Brogdon ends up working for the CEO of a cybersecurity company protecting the Internet from cyber attacks and intrusions. Brogdon’s quest to know the unknown in her spiritual inner world collides with this CEO’s quest to know the unknown in his high-tech outer world, revealing a very real, and surprising phenomenon involving the Internet. A true story that reads like a novel, the book shines a light on some hidden dark places, revealing hidden truths formerly unknown. Watch the Book Trailer!
author: Patricia Brogdon
